description: Inspired by the rich, smooth feel of fine leather, Kakaha captures that laidback island attitude in a dapper design. Slide in and slide through the day, there’s no need to rush with the premium Kakaha. It’s a casual, yet versatile style that looks good in town or in the office. Made for the beach, not the ocean—prolonged contact with water may cause damage.
name: Olukai Kakaha - Mens

specs.value: Designed with rich, smooth full- grain leather that is fully unlined, allowing the upper to conform to your foot over time
The dual-density PU footbed and cushy gel insert deliver maximum comfort and support. Removable and washable
Kākaha sits atop a lightweight and cushioned EVA sole that features a water-wave pattern and two 'Wet Grip Rubber' pods strategically placed in high- wear areas for added underfoot support
The raw-edge leather seam stitching on our signature Drop-In Heel® makes it effortless to slip on and off. Leather Working Group certiﬁed supplier
